ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Reference-free method for conducting EWAS while deconvoluting DNA methylation arising as mixtures of cell types.  The older method (Houseman et al., 2014,<doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btu029>) is similar to surrogate variable analysis (SVA and ISVA), except that it makes additional use of a biological mixture assumption. The newer method (Houseman et al., 2016, <doi:10.1186/s12859-016-1140-4>) is similar to non-negative matrix factorization, with additional constraints and additional utilities.

Reference-free method for conducting EWAS while deconvoluting DNA methylation arising as mixtures of cell types.  The older method (Houseman et al., 2014,<doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btu029>) is similar to surrogate variable analysis (SVA and ISVA), except that it makes additional use of a biological mixture assumption. The newer method (Houseman et al., 2016, <doi:10.1186/s12859-016-1140-4>) is similar to non-negative matrix factorization, with additional constraints and additional utilities.

name: r-reffreeewas
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '2.2' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-reffreeewas
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/RefFreeEWAS_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/RefFreeEWAS/RefFreeEWAS_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: de2812f166caabf6ea01c0533402e5cd9d8a525a2a7583e4757decf22319caab

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-quadprog
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-quadprog

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('RefFreeEWAS')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('RefFreeEWAS')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=RefFreeEWAS
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Reference-free method for conducting EWAS while deconvoluting DNA methylation arising
    as mixtures of cell types.  The older method (Houseman et al., 2014,<doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btu029>)
    is similar to surrogate variable analysis (SVA and ISVA), except that it makes additional
    use of a biological mixture assumption. The newer method (Houseman et al., 2016,
    <doi:10.1186/s12859-016-1140-4>) is similar to non-negative matrix factorization,
    with additional constraints and additional utilities.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: RefFreeEWAS
# Version: 2.2
# Date: 2018-12-14
# Title: EWAS using Reference-Free DNA Methylation Mixture Deconvolution
# Author: E. Andres Houseman, Sc.D.
# Maintainer: E. Andres Houseman <eahouseman@gmail.com>
# Depends: R (>= 3.2.2), quadprog
# Description: Reference-free method for conducting EWAS while deconvoluting DNA methylation arising as mixtures of cell types.  The older method (Houseman et al., 2014,<doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btu029>) is similar to surrogate variable analysis (SVA and ISVA), except that it makes additional use of a biological mixture assumption. The newer method (Houseman et al., 2016, <doi:10.1186/s12859-016-1140-4>) is similar to non-negative matrix factorization, with additional constraints and additional utilities.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-12-14 05:31:13 UTC; EHouseman
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-12-14 06:00:03 UTC
